ai.summary: Fairy Glen Trail - Short is a gentle 2.7 km hike in the United Kingdom. The route uses well marked dirt paths with mostly flat terrain, making it suitable for beginners and families. Expect tranquil countryside scenery and a short loop that typically takes about 1 to 2 hours depending on pace.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail follows well maintained dirt and gravel paths, mostly flat with a few gentle inclines. Expect grassy sections and possible muddy patches after rain. Footing is generally even, but there may be uneven ground or small rocks in places. It is a short loop close to the starting point.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast before you go; UK weather can change rapidly. Wear sturdy waterproof footwear and bring a light rain jacket. Stay on the marked path, watch for slippery sections when wet, and keep children and pets under supervision. Carry sufficient water and a mobile phone; tell someone your plan and expected return time. Leave no trace and avoid disturbing wildlife.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) for milder weather and longer days; winter visits are possible but often wetter and with shorter daylight.
